modName: Creating a standalone character using ECE.
summary: very simple and short guide to create a custom standalone character for ECE users.
descriptionHtml:
[b][youtube]d6N_4kCX3_Q[/youtube]

http://youtu.be/d6N_4kCX3_Q

[color=#ead1dc][size=4]Description[/size][/color][/b]
Here's my tutorial on how to create a custom standalone character :)
Most of them are very easy but takes some works to be done. I tried to keep this tutorial as simple as possible.
If the video is too fast, pause or play slowly. Watch in HD.

[color=#ead1dc][size=4][b]Notes[/b][/size][/color]
There are few parts I forgot to cover in the video.
First, you need to put the hairline you created in the extra file in your hair file.
Second, the author of ECE doesn't allow anyone to upload his assets except femalehead.nif file. Delete his other works in your folder.
And as always, make sure to get all the permissions from the original authors.
